textboxes.description: Em and Bubba find themselves in a large, intimidating tribunal court. The room is filled with stern judges and a bustling crowd. Multiple charges have been brought against them from their past adventures. They stand accused of felonies ranging from illegal alchemy to destruction of public property and even accusations of involvement with shady magical organizations. The fate of both of them hangs in the balance.

choices.text: Defend yourself by denying all charges and plead innocence
Attempt to bribe the judge to get a lighter sentence
Consult with Bubba and come up with a strategy to prove the charges are fabricated

textboxes.description: You deny all charges, but the prosecutor presents evidence of your past exploits. A magical item you once used, a journal entry from your journey, and even a video recording from a third-party camera. The evidence is overwhelming.

choices.text: Try to discredit the evidence, saying it's forged or falsified
Admit to the crimes but ask for leniency on the basis of your previous good deeds
Request a jury trial to have your case heard by peers

textboxes.description: The judge seems skeptical as you try to bribe him with an offer of money and rare artifacts. The prosecutor raises an eyebrow, clearly aware of the attempt. The tension in the courtroom rises.

choices.text: Try to charm the judge with your charisma and convince him you're harmless
Bribe the prosecutor instead in an attempt to win his favor
Give up the bribe and attempt to defend your actions legally

textboxes.description: You whisper to Bubba, strategizing on how to approach the trial. Bubba suggests using your old contacts, including one in the magical underground network, to prove the charges against you are based on rumors and false claims.

choices.text: Use your contact in the magical underground to disprove the claims
Submit a legal defense by highlighting the flaws in the prosecution's case
Request a recess to gather more evidence in your favor

textboxes.description: You attempt to discredit the evidence, but the prosecutor's cryptographic expert quickly dismantles your argument. The evidence appears irrefutable. The judge's eyes narrow, sensing the weak defense.

choices.text: Admit to some of the charges and try to negotiate a plea deal
Make a last-ditch effort to call in a surprise witness

textboxes.description: You admit to the crimes but beg the court for leniency, referencing your past good deeds. The prosecutor scoffs, and the judge seems unmoved, but there's a small glimmer of hope.

choices.text: Mention your potential to help with future legal or criminal investigations
Ask Bubba to speak on your behalf, hoping his emotional appeal will sway the judge

textboxes.description: You request a jury trial, believing that having your case judged by a group of people rather than a single judge will work in your favor. The court grants the request, and you wait for the jury to be selected.

choices.text: Present your case to the jury in a calm and logical manner
Try to win the jury over with an emotional appeal

textboxes.description: The judge seems momentarily swayed by your charm but quickly regains composure. The courtroom watches as you attempt to win his favor with your words. The tension builds, and the prosecutor appears unimpressed.

choices.text: Shift to a more aggressive approach, demanding a fair trial
Backtrack and present evidence of your past good deeds

textboxes.description: You bribe the prosecutor, offering him a rare artifact, but it backfires. The prosecutor calls in the guards, and suddenly the situation escalates. You’re now in deeper trouble than before.

choices.text: Attempt to escape the courtroom and flee
Apologize and confess, hoping the judge will show mercy

textboxes.description: You drop the bribe and decide to present your case legally. The prosecutor smirks, but you hold your ground, citing legal precedents and trying to sway the judge's opinion.

choices.text: Argue the legal flaws in the prosecutor’s case
Challenge the legality of some of the evidence presented

textboxes.description: You call on your underground contact, but the network is slow to respond. The prosecution senses a delay in your defense, leaving you vulnerable.

choices.text: Improvise by explaining your actions and citing a precedent case
Request a delay, risking the judge's patience

textboxes.description: You cite legal precedents and construct a defense, gaining some traction. The judge seems to consider your case more carefully.

choices.text: Present additional evidence to reinforce your argument
Conclude by emphasizing your dedication to the law and truth

textboxes.description: You request a delay to buy time, but the judge’s patience wears thin. He warns you that any further stalling will be seen as contempt of court.

choices.text: Push your case forward and apologize for the delay
Attempt an escape from the courtroom before the situation worsens

skill_check.fail: You are apprehended and face an even harsher sentence.

textboxes.description: After a tense final presentation, the judge concludes that you've proven yourself worthy of a second chance. In a moment of unexpected leniency, he dismisses most charges and gives you a light sentence for minor infractions. You and Bubba walk away, free to continue your adventures, but with a renewed sense of caution. This trial has proven that even heroes have limits.

choices.text: End of Adventure

textboxes.description: The court reaches a mixed verdict, granting you partial freedom but requiring community service under strict supervision. Although disappointed, you accept the result, hoping to quietly rebuild your reputation.

choices.text: End of Adventure

textboxes.description: The escape attempt goes poorly. Guards quickly catch you and Bubba, and you are dragged back to the judge, who delivers a harsh sentence: confinement in a mystical prison. Although you’ve lost your freedom, you vow to find a way out someday.

choices.text: End of Adventure
